profile.name: Okta Administrators
profile.description: Okta manages this group, which contains all administrators in your organization.

roles.label: Access Certifications Administrator
roles.description: An IGA admin role for managing access certifications

roles.label: Access Requests Administrator

response.name: Classic Migrated
response.description: Policy created during OIE upgrade and applied to all applications that were protected by the default app-sign on policy in Classic.

response.name: Password only
response.description: Require only a password. Suggested for low risk or consumer-facing applications.

response.name: One factor access
response.description: Allow access with any one factor. Suggested for low risk or consumer-facing applications.

response.name: Seamless access based on network context
response.description: Require 2FA if the user is off network. Configure your network zones to include them here.

notes.enduser: this is used to login to salto

response.name: Default Policy
response.description: The default policy applies in all situations if no other policy applies.

response.name: Direct Authentication
response.description: Enables new OAuth grant types that can be used to authenticate directly and get tokens without the use of a browser

response.name: Okta Verify user verification with passcode
response.description: Users can now enable PIN or passcode in addition to biometric confirmation for their Okta Verify account. This feature adds user verification support for devices without biometric capabilities and users with accessibility needs.
